rules.description: Focus Vivaldi and Open New Tab (Cmd+N)

to.shell_command:
#!/bin/bash

# Focus or launch Vivaldi
osascript -e 'tell application "Vivaldi" to activate'

# Wait briefly for activation (adjust if needed)
sleep 0.3

# Open new tab
osascript -e 'tell application "Vivaldi"
if (count of windows) = 0 then make new window
make new tab at end of tabs of front window
end tell'
